A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Would have been fine as a non Star Wars movie but displays an antipathy for the morality and characters of the original trilogy that makes it terrible to watch.  If you never loved the originals then fine\, maybe you can like this for the explosions.  But it makes no sense in the galaxy it pretends to inhabit.  Maybe they can do a fast and furious 12 with a star wars crossover to let the jedi ghosts deathrace each other.
